name: Prismatic Wizardry
description:
You play as the mage Dimdrab who needs to protect himself against evil spirits.

It is a 2.5D top down arcade shooter.

This game currently only supports a gampad! (The Keyboard Controls are a bit buggy)

Controls:

  • Left-Stick / WASD to move
  • LB / L-Ctrl to lock and aim
  • Face-Buttons (A,B,X,Y) / Arrow Keys to shoot

Self-Reflection:

  • This is my first gamejam submission, and I am quite happy how it turned out
  • I wish I had more time to improve gameplay and sounddesign
  • (especially sounddesign is where I have to improve my skills)
  • Originally I had a tutorial planned but due to time constraints (48h) I had to cut it
